page.title: 04Population in Aith
page.content: 201 people live within the block. There are 75 houses in the area mostly concentrated around Aith Voe. There are 57 children under the age of 16, a number of whom over the age of 14, attend school in Lerwick and return home at weekends. Of the working population 79 people are in full-time, paid employment. There are 30 people who are either housewives, in part-time jobs or unemployed. Of the full-time workers 28 have jobs within the block while 51 work outside the block.There are only a few people unemployed in the area. There are 41 old age pensioners.
